text: @SpeakerPelosi @Morning_Joe Pelosi....your grasping at straws again!  You weren't prepared for the Pandemic either.  Where was your assistance, your insight, your leadership regarding the Coronavirus???  You didn't have a clue! Now your trying to blame Trump in an extremely desperate attempt to defeat him!
